cards.title: The Machine Heart
powers: Until the start of your next turn, the first time the machine heart would be dealt damage by a target, reduce that damage by 1. The machine heart may deal 1 damage of that type to the source.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player May Draw a card now.
Reveal the top card of the environment deck, discard or replace card on top of the deck.
prevent the next damage dealt to a hero target.

openingLines.default: When you know your enemy, they are already defeated.

cards.title: Appearance Of Evil
body: [i]The Machine Heart switches hologram to appear as the villain. [/i]
cards.powers: Until the start of your next turn, The Machine Heart is immune to damage from non-character villain cards.  Villain character cards are immune to damage from hero character cards.

cards.title: Appearance Of Good
body: The Machine Heart regains 2 HP at the end of his turn.  Reduce Damage Dealt to Heroes by 1.  Destroy this card at the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Digital Wardrobe
body: Draw 4 cards, play 1 card.  End turn immediately

cards.title: Field Generator
body: [i]The Machine Heart patented force field generator Mk. 45 [/i]

cards.title: Field Projector
powers: Deal 1 Energy Damage to The Machine Heart.  Deal 2 Energy damage to 1 target.

cards.title: Holographic Disguises
body: Hero damage is irreducible.  Destroy this card at the start of your turn

cards.title: I, Grenade
body: {TMH} deals one target X radiant damage, where X = the difference between his current HP and 13. Reduce [i]The Machine Heart's[/i] HP to 13.
Shuffle this card into [i]The Machine Heart's[/i] deck.

cards.title: Intangible Proof
body: Reveal the Top card of the Villain deck and the top card of The Machine Hearts deck.  You may place These cards on the top or bottom of their deck.   Draw a Card.

cards.title: Link to the Underworld
body: Whenever an equipment card is destroyed, you may place it beneath this card.
powers: Play one equipment card beneath this card in its heroes play area.
Destroy all cards beneath this card.  Deal X infernal damage to non-hero target where X is the number of cards destroyed this way.

cards.title: Mixed Orders
body: [This card is still in development, and will imitate Digital Wardrobe, Draw 4 play 1, end turn immediately.  ]One villain target deals one target 3 Melee Damage.

cards.title: Non-Vital Hit
body: Immune to Projectile damage, immune to melee damage.
powers: Prevent all damage to the machine heart until the start of your next turn, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Professional Infiltration
body: When this card is played, search the villain deck for one card, and the environment deck for one card.  Place both cards beneath this card, then shuffle both decks.  At the start of your turn if the machine heart does not deal himself 3 psychic damage, destroy this card.  When this card is destroyed, play both cards beneath it.

cards.title: Recon
body: Reveal top card of Environment Deck.  If this card is a target, discard it and gain 2 health.  If not replace the card, you may use 1 power now.

cards.title: Side Kick
body: Place this card next to target hero, TMH may redirect damage from this target to himself

cards.title: Solar Power Cell
body: At the start of your turn, place a token on this card.
powers: Remove all tokens from this card and restore X HP, where X is the number of tokens discarded this way.

cards.title: Years of Experience
body: The Machine Heart searches through his deck for 3 cards, puts two in his hand and discards the third.  Shuffle the deck.
